com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.coding.commands.session

Class OpenSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.coding.commands.IpmiCommandCoder
      • com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.coding.commands.session.OpenSession

  • public class OpenSession
extends IpmiCommandCoder
    Wrapper class for RMCP+ Open Session request.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenSession

        public OpenSession(CipherSuite cipherSuite)
        Initiates class for decoding. Sets IPMI version to IpmiVersion.V20 since OpenSession is a RMCP+ command. Sets authentication type to RMCP+.
        Parameters:
        cipherSuite - - CipherSuite containing authentication, confidentiality and integrity algorithms for this session. Cipher Suite might (and probably will be, because at this point of session creation SIK is not yet known) be not initialized.
        See Also:
        IpmiVersion

      • OpenSession

        public OpenSession(int sessionID,
           PrivilegeLevel privilegeLevel,
           CipherSuite cipherSuite)
        Initiates class for encoding and decoding. Sets IPMI version to IpmiVersion.V20 since OpenSession is a RMCP+ command. Sets authentication type to RMCP+.
        Parameters:
        sessionID - - Session ID selected by the remote console.
        privilegeLevel - - Requested privilege level for the session. Can be PrivilegeLevel.MaximumAvailable.
        cipherSuite - - CipherSuite containing authentication, confidentiality and integrity algorithms for this session. Cipher Suite might (and probably will be, because at this point of session creation SIK is not yet known) be not initialized.
        See Also:
        IpmiVersion, CipherSuite, AuthenticationAlgorithm, IntegrityAlgorithm, ConfidentialityAlgorithm

      • encodeCommand

        public IpmiMessage encodeCommand(int sequenceNumber,
                        int sessionId)
        Description copied from class: IpmiCommandCoder
        Prepares an IPMI request message containing class-specific command
        Overrides:
        encodeCommand in class IpmiCommandCoder
        Parameters:
        sequenceNumber - - A generated sequence number used for matching request and response. If IPMI message is sent in a session, it is used as a Session Sequence Number. For all IPMI messages, sequenceNumber % 256 is used as a IPMI LAN Message sequence number and as an IPMI payload message tag.
        sessionId - - ID of the managed system's session message is being sent in. For sessionless commands should b set to 0.
        Returns:
        IPMI message

      • getResponseData

        public ResponseData getResponseData(IpmiMessage message)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                    IPMIException
        Description copied from class: IpmiCommandCoder
        Retrieves command-specific response data from IPMI message
        Specified by:
        getResponseData in class IpmiCommandCoder
        Parameters:
        message - - IPMI message
        Returns:
        response data
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when message is not a response for class-specific command or response has invalid length.
        IPMIException - when response completion code isn't OK.
